title: Web Development Practical Competency Enhancement: Online Task-Based Science English Communication Skills Improvement Program

context.prior_knowledge: English reading comprehension skills at the secondary education level and basic understanding of scientific terminology
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can deliver an oral presentation in English (three or more sentences) explaining scientific experiment procedures.
Learners can accurately use at least ten specialized terms when discussing scientific topics online via collaboration tools (chat/video calls) with peers.
Learners can correct the pronunciation of 20 core science-related vocabulary items with at least 80% accuracy using a mobile pronunciation-checking app.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
